author: peter_firmstone
msg: Changes to mahalo for safe publication, added Starter to TxnManagerImpl and improved atomicity, fields made final and volatile all tests passing on sparc.
Changes to CombinerSecurityManager and ConcurrentPolicyProvider to prevent finalizer attack.  (Finalizer attacks can assist untrusted code to attain privileged status).
